    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1854</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Map of the world according to the Bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karte der Welt entsprechend der Bibel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte du monde selon la bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa do mundo de acordo com o bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma del mondo secondo la bibbia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης του κόσμου σύμφωνα με τη Βίβλο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia del mundo según la biblia</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a colored map of the world according to the bible, as known to the hebrews.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nationalism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ethnicity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine farbige Karte der Welt 
entsprechend der Bibel, wie bekannt die Hebräer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une carte colorée du monde selon la bible, 
comme connu des Hébreux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um mapa colorido do mundo de acordo com o 
bible, como sabido aos hebrews.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un programma colorato del mondo secondo la
bibbia, come conosciuto agli ebrei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένας χρωματισμένος χάρτης του κόσμου 
σύμφωνα με τη Βίβλο, όπως είναι γνωστός στους Εβραίους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una correspondencia coloreada del mundo 
según la biblia, según lo sabido a los hebreos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
